Texts.Eng: Chacharra impressed! Justicar difficult to take down, container a good prize. Chacharra can make weapon from it, for price.

I found a large container full of Vaash acid, previously used by a Justicar to power its weapons. ^green;I should find an Akkimari who knows their way around Vaash weapons ^white;- perhaps they can fashion a new weapon for me using this container.
